2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthi warshaya nimiththen wesak pun poho dina arambaunu wishesha pinkam warshaya pura pawathwena mahawihara pun pohoya wadasatahan ha samagami wa anuradhapura jaya siri maha bo samindun sewane di pawathwimata anuradhapura atamasthanadhipathi saha uthuru madhyama disawe pradhana sanghanayaka aacharya pallegama siriniwasa nahimiyan ge anushasana paridi katayuthu sanwidhana kere.mahawihara poson pun pohoya wadasatahana poson pun poho dina perawaru 6.00 sita pasudina perawaru 6.00 thek anuradhapura jaya shri maha bodhi wiharasthanaye mahawihara sannipatha shalawe di pawathwe.poson pun poho dina perawaru 8.00 ta mahawihara sannipatha shalawa asala di anuradhapura atamasthanadhipathi saha uthuru madhyama disawe pradhana sanghanayaka aacharya pallegama siriniwasa nahimiyange athin gawayakuta abhaya danaya labade.poson pun poho dina paswaru 5.15 ta anuradhapura jaya siri maha bo samindun abiyasa di dewani waratath sambuddhathwa jayanthi padawithihara pujawa pawathwe.

wadawasam samajaya thula pradhana washayen panthi dekak daknata labe.ee radala idam himiyan ha prewnidasayan washayeni.mema samaja kramaye di idam ayithiya radalayan sathuwu athara owun sathu idam bhukthiya wenuwen prewanidasayan wisin radalayata yam wandiyak gewiya yuthuya.mehi pradhana nishpadana sadhakaya idamayi.radalayata ayath idame sampath parihojanaya ha aayojanayada prewnidasaya wisin sidukarayi.bohowita radalayata ayath idame waga kirimath eeyin kotasak radalayata labadimath siduwiya.mita amatharawa radalaya wenuwen shramaya sapayimada siduwiya.mehi dida radalayan wisin prewnidasayan pidanayata path kirima hamuwe prewnidasayan thama sadaranathwaya udesa kala satane prathipalayak lesa wadawasam samajaya bidawati dhanawadi jamaja kramaya bihiwe.
